TSLA.title: Tesla beats earnings expectations and raises production guidance
TSLA.description: Tesla reported record quarterly profits and announced plans to ramp up production in multiple factories.

TSLA.title: Tesla faces minor delays in delivery due to supply chain issues
TSLA.description: Some deliveries are expected to be pushed to next quarter, but management remains optimistic.

INFY.title: Infosys signs multi-billion dollar deal with a US healthcare company
INFY.description: The long-term contract is expected to significantly boost Infosys' revenue visibility.

INFY.title: Analysts remain cautious as Infosys margins stay under pressure
INFY.description: Rising employee costs and competition continue to challenge profitability.

AAPL.title: Apple launches new iPhone model with improved camera and battery life
AAPL.description: Early reviews suggest strong consumer interest and high pre-order volumes.

AAPL.title: Apple faces lawsuit over alleged App Store monopoly practices
AAPL.description: Regulators are increasing scrutiny on Apple's App Store fees and policies.

HDFCBANK.title: HDFC Bank reports strong loan growth and stable asset quality
HDFCBANK.description: The bank's quarterly results exceeded market expectations on key metrics.

HDFCBANK.title: RBI asks HDFC Bank to improve its digital infrastructure
HDFCBANK.description: The regulator highlighted the need for stronger resilience in online banking systems.
